item.title: 梅赛德斯-奔驰：正与供应商就稀土 "缓冲器 "进行谈判
item.description: 尽管稀土短缺已导致一些供应商关闭工厂和生产线，但梅赛德斯-奔驰仍在与其顶级供应商商讨建立稀土库存的事宜。【原文：Mercedes-Benz is talking to its top suppliers about building rare earth stockpiles even though the carmaker has not seen any impact from a shortage that has caused some suppliers to shut down plants and production lines.】

item.title: 凯雷战略投资后，保险经纪公司 Trucordia 的估值达 57 亿美元
item.description: 保险经纪公司 Trucordia 周三表示，获得了全球投资公司凯雷 13 亿美元的战略投资，公司估值超过 57 亿美元。【原文：Insurance brokerage firm Trucordia received a $1.3 billion strategic investment from global investment firm Carlyle , valuing the company at more than $5.7 billion, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 信实集团和 Airtel 集团质疑印度卫星通信费 "过低"，这将有助于 Starlink 的发展
item.description: 代表印度电信巨头 Reliance Jio 和 Bharti Airtel 的一个团体表示，如果印度以 "不合理的低价 "为卫星频谱定价，使埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 Starlink 等卫星互联网服务受益，他们的业务将受到影响。【原文：A group representing Indian telecom giants Reliance Jio and Bharti Airtel has said their businesses will suffer if India prices satellite spectrum at "unjustifiably low" rates that benefit satellite internet services such as Elon Musk's Starlink.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯钢铁欧洲公司：美国关税影响有限，但给贸易带来压力
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯钢铁欧洲公司（Thyssenkrupp Steel Europe）周三表示，美国对钢铁征收关税对该公司的直接影响有限，但该公司警告说，增加进口关税会给更广泛的贸易关系带来压力。【原文：U.S. tariffs on steel have only a limited direct effect on Thyssenkrupp Steel Europe, the company said on Wednesday, but the increase in import duties brings with it pressure on trade relations more broadly, it warned.】

item.title: 英国马洛公司与外包公司米蒂公司就潜在交易进行谈判
item.description: 英国商业软件供应商马洛（Marlowe）周三表示，该公司正在洽谈被外包公司米蒂集团（Mitie Group）收购的事宜。【原文：British business software provider Marlowe said on Wednesday it was in talks to be acquired by outsourcer Mitie Group .】

item.title: 早间竞价全球股市屡创新高
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 微软提出免费加强欧洲政府的网络安全
item.description: 微软公司表示，将向欧洲各国政府免费提供一项网络安全计划，该计划于本周三启动，旨在加强各国政府对网络威胁的防御，包括人工智能增强的网络威胁。【原文：Microsoft is offering free of charge to European governments a cybersecurity programme, launched on Wednesday, to bolster their defences against cyber threats, including those enhanced by artificial intelligence, it said.】

item.title: 福特因安全气囊指示灯问题召回近 6.4 万辆紧凑型皮卡车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周三表示，福特汽车公司将因安全气囊指示灯问题召回63898辆紧凑型皮卡。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday that Ford Motor Co would recall 63,898 compact pickup trucks over concerns related to an airbag indicator light.】

item.title: 联合国贸易机构称关税将推高美国海鲜价格
item.description: 据联合国贸易机构周三发布的一份报告称，全球贸易紧张局势可能会扰乱海洋产品贸易，并将推高美国这个鱼类主要进口国的海鲜价格。【原文：Global trade tensions could disrupt ocean goods trade and will push up the price of seafood in the United States, a major importer of fish, according to a report from the United Nations trade agency published on Wednesday.】

item.title: 科技股找到支撑，美国股指期货上涨
item.description: 美国股指期货周三走高，原因是惠普企业公司（Hewlett Packard Enterprise）的业绩提振了人工智能的乐观情绪，科技股上涨，而投资者则在等待新的数据，以更好地衡量唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税对经济的影响。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged higher on Wednesday as Hewlett Packard Enterprise's results fanned AI optimism and tech shares gained, while investors awaited fresh data to better gauge the economic impact of President Donald Trump's tariffs.】

item.title: 美元树公司预测第二季度利润疲软
item.description: 折扣店运营商 Dollar Tree 预计，考虑到关税变化造成的波动，其第二季度调整后利润将比去年同期下降多达 50%，这导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌约 4%。【原文：Discount store operator Dollar Tree forecast its second-quarter adjusted profit to be down as much as 50% compared with a year ago, accounting for volatility caused due to changing tariffs, sending its shares about 4% lower in premarket trading.】

item.title: 意法半导体首席执行官认为市场有回暖迹象，将实现第二季度目标
item.description: 意法半导体公司（STMicroelectronics）首席执行官周三表示，这家法国-意大利芯片制造商已经看到了经济上行的迹象，即市场需求增加的时期，这将促进其未来几个季度的业绩。【原文：STMicroelectronics' chief executive said on Wednesday that the French-Italian chipmaker has seen signs of an upcycle — a period of increased market demand — which will boost its results in the coming quarters.】

item.title: 中国稀土出口管制须知
item.description: 全球制造商对中国限制稀土合金、混合物和磁铁出口的决定敲响了警钟。【原文：Global manufacturers have raised the alarm on China's decision to curb exports of rare earths alloys, mixtures and magnets.】

item.title: 华尔街监管机构将审议针对在美上市外国公司的规则
item.description: 据一份公告称，美国证券交易委员会将于本周三就哪些外国公司有资格享受较宽松的投资者信息披露要求制定新规则，并将迈出第一步。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Wednesday is due to take the first steps toward producing new rules on which foreign firms qualify for less stringent investor disclosure requirements, according to a public notice.】

item.title: 消息人士称，日本央行明年将考虑放缓缩减债券规模的步伐
item.description: 四位熟悉日本央行想法的消息人士称，日本央行正在考虑从下一财年起放缓缩减购债的步伐，此举将表明日本央行注重避免债券市场出现大的混乱。【原文：The Bank of Japan is considering slowing the pace of tapering in its bond purchases from next fiscal year onward, said four sources familiar with its thinking, a move that would signal its focus on avoiding big bond market disruptions.】

item.title: 美国参议员就 Rocket-Redfin 交易向反垄断执法者施压
item.description: 一群美国参议员要求联邦反垄断执法人员解释为何没有阻止 Rocket Companies 以 17.5 亿美元收购房地产挂牌平台 Redfin，称该交易可能会提高购房者的成本。【原文：A group of U.S. Senators have demanded that federal antitrust enforcers explain why they did not seek to block Rocket Companies' $1.75 billion acquisition of real estate listing platform Redfin , saying the deal could raise costs for homebuyers.】

item.title: 特斯拉 5 月德国汽车销量继续下滑
item.description: 德国道路交通机构 KBA 周三表示，尽管电池电动汽车的销量总体上有所增长，但特斯拉 5 月份在德国的销量下降了三分之一。【原文：Tesla's sales volume in Germany fell by a third in May, the German road traffic agency KBA said on Wednesday, although sales of battery electric vehicles rose overall.】

item.title: 美联储结束冻结增长后富国银行股价上涨
item.description: 富国银行股价在周三的盘前交易中上涨超过 3%，此前美国联邦储备委员会取消了对其资产的长期限制，这标志着该银行在重建声誉的过程中迈出了关键的一步。【原文：Wells Fargo shares rose more than 3% in premarket trading on Wednesday, after the U.S. Federal Reserve lifted a longstanding cap on its assets, marking a crucial milestone in the bank's push to rebuild its reputation.】

item.title: 特斯拉中国制造电动汽车 5 月销量同比下降 15
item.description: 中国乘用车联席会（CPCA）周三公布的数据显示，美国汽车制造商特斯拉（Tesla）5月份在中国生产的电动汽车销量同比下降15%，降至61662辆。【原文：U.S. automaker Tesla's China-made electric vehicle sales fell 15% in May from a year earlier to 61,662 vehicles, data from the China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 协会称，中国限制稀土使用后，部分欧洲汽车供应商工厂停产
item.description: 欧洲汽车供应商协会（CLEPA）表示，由于中国限制稀土出口导致稀土短缺，欧洲多家汽车供应商的工厂和生产线已经停工，并警告说未来还会有更多停工事件发生。【原文：Several European auto supplier plants and production lines have been shut down due to a shortage of rare earths caused by China imposing restrictions on exports, Europe's auto supplier association CLEPA said, warning of further outages to come.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司计划投资 100 亿美元在瑞典建立人工智能数据中心
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management，BAM）计划投资高达 950 亿瑞典克朗（约合 99.1 亿美元），在瑞典建设一个人工智能数据中心。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management (BAM) plans to invest up to 95 billion Swedish crowns ($9.91 billion) to build a data centre for artificial intelligence in Sweden, the Canadian company said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 诺基亚、英伟达和国防企业支持欧盟资助的无人机基础设施监督项目
item.description: 芬兰网络设备制造商诺基亚公司周三表示，由诺基亚牵头、超过42个组织组成的联盟将开展一个无人机项目，旨在保护和加强欧洲最关键基础设施的恢复能力。【原文：A consortium of more than 42 organizations, led by Nokia , will work on an unmanned drone project aimed at protecting and bolstering the resilience of Europe's most critical infrastructures, the Finnish network equipment maker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 关税不确定，Counterpoint Research下调2025年全球智能手机出货量增速
item.description: 研究公司Counterpoint周三将2025年全球智能手机出货量增长预期从早先预测的4.2%下调至1.9%，理由是美国关税带来的不确定性。【原文：Research firm Counterpoint cut growth expectations for global smartphone shipments in 2025 to 1.9% on Wednesday, down from its earlier forecast of 4.2%, citing uncertainties surrounding U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车公司五月份销量下降 12
item.description: 总部位于瑞典的沃尔沃汽车公司周三表示，5 月份共售出 59822 辆汽车，同比下降 12%。【原文：Volvo Cars sold 59,822 cars in May, down 12% from a year earlier, the Sweden-based company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 索瑞尔的 S4 Capital 下调年度收入预期，原因是科技客户保持谨慎态度
item.description: 马丁-索瑞尔（Martin Sorrell）的广告集团 S4 Capital 周三表示，由于科技客户在全球经济疲软和美国征收关税的背景下保持谨慎，该公司预计全年同类净收入将出现较低的个位数下降。【原文：Martin Sorrell's ad group S4 Capital said on Wednesday it expects annual like-for-like net revenue to decline by low single digits, as tech clients remain cautious amid a weaker global economy and U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 巴克莱将标准普尔 500 指数年底目标上调至 6,050 点
item.description: 巴克莱银行周三将 S&P 500 指数的年终目标价从 5900 点上调至 6050 点，理由是贸易不确定性的缓解以及对 2026 年盈利增长正常化的预期。【原文：Barclays raised its year-end price target for the S&P 500 index to 6,050 from 5,900 on Wednesday, citing easing trade uncertainty and expectations of normalized earnings growth in 2026.】

item.title: 现代退出印度欧拉电动车公司，起亚出售 8000 万美元股份减持股份
item.description: 根据交易所的数据，现代汽车出售了其在 Ola Electric 的全部股份，而竞争对手韩国汽车制造商起亚则削减了其持股量，合计出售股份价值 68.9 亿卢比（8,000 万美元）。【原文：Hyundai Motor sold its entire stake in Ola Electric , while rival South Korean carmaker Kia trimmed its holding, in a combined share sale worth 6.89 billion rupees ($80 million), according to exchange data.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，中国航空公司考虑订购数百架空中客车喷气机
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引知情人士的话报道称，中国的航空公司正在考虑最快在下个月订购数百架空中客车公司（Airbus SE）的飞机。【原文：Chinese airlines are considering ordering hundreds of Airbus SE aircraft as soon as next month, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 人头马君度撤销中期目标，年度利润下降
item.description: 法国烈酒集团人头马君度（Remy Cointreau）公布的年度有机营业利润降幅为 30.5%，低于预期，该集团撤回了中期目标，并表示下一财年的销售额将恢复到中个位数增长。【原文：French spirits group Remy Cointreau reported a smaller-than-expected 30.5% drop in annual organic operating profit, withdrew its mid-term goals and said sales would return to mid-to-single-digit growth during the next financial year.】

item.title: 荷兰汽车共享公司新增可为当地电网供电的雷诺电动汽车
item.description: 荷兰汽车共享公司 MyWheels 本周将为其荷兰车队的首批 500 辆可并网的雷诺电动汽车插电，随着该技术的普及，欧洲能够加强电网的车辆数量也将增加。【原文：Dutch car sharing firm MyWheels will plug in the first of 500 grid-connectable Renault EVs to its fleet in the Netherlands this week, expanding the number of vehicles in Europe capable of strengthening the power grid as the technology gains traction.】
